channel.title: For Anyone Interested In Kaitnieks/Scene History
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.blumentals.net/images/team_aivars.jpg[/img][/center]
The archives are still around for the forum. This is fairly well known but some of you newer folk may be interested in learning a bit of the history. Kaits was obviously before mitb and a vast majority of the memberbase moved here after Kaits shut his community down.
[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20051127090355/www.kaitnieks.com/scr/]Kaitnieks Forums[/url]
[url=http://www.kaitnieks.com/index2/]Site[/url] is also still up for anyone wanting to browse the old news stories or the history that's written there. There's a lot of the early days mentioned.

item.title: For Anyone Interested In Kaitnieks/Scene History
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:24, topic:523178”][quote author=odie5533 link=topic=641730.msg4376610#msg4376610 date=1382232972]

What caused Kaitnieks to close?

His daughter was born which pulled him away from his hobbies.

First post ever on either site; impressive lol

I was biding my time for the last 7 years, waiting for the right moment to strike.
[/quote]

Your scar scripts got me started :)[/quote]
haha I remember odie helping me with my MSN chat flooder in Scar and using it on my friends and thinking I was on some CIA hacking shit man

Read full topic
item.source: For Anyone Interested In Kaitnieks/Scene History

item.title: For Anyone Interested In Kaitnieks/Scene History
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:12, topic:523178”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=641730.msg4323847#msg4323847 date=1372570239]
EVILCOWGOD was betterrrr.
[/quote]

cow has been around here, but not since 2011.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And for those who don’t know, evilcowgod wrote the black book of rs cheating which is some summarized history. I found this link: http://rix.ifixshit.net/bb/
I couldn’t find version 6 from PaulT (which cow didn’t seem to like) I remember it included a little bit of info on private servers, unless I am wrong.[/quote]
He hangs around quite a few private rizon channels along with a lot of other rs cheating vets iirc. You might even be in some of the channels actually, I think I’ve seen you around there before.

Read full topic
